Package adrenaline.model.map

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • adrenaline.model.map.Square
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NormalSquare, SpawnPoint
    public class Square
extends java.lang.Object
    Square is a single "element" which compose the map, it is characterized by an id, a room and the links to the other squares in the map

    • Constructor Detail

      • Square

        public Square​(int id,
              java.lang.String color,
              boolean sp,
              java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> links)
        Constructor which initialize the static attributes of a square
        Parameters:
        id - is the id of a square
        color - is the room's color the square belongs to
        sp - states if the square is a spawn point or not
        links - refers to the ids of the square which are "linked" to the actual square

        public boolean isInTheSameRoom​(Square s)
        Method to know if two squares are in the same room
        Parameters:
        s - is the square compared to the present square
        Returns:
        true (if color of this square equals color of s), false (otherwise)
